item.title: CVE-2024-37558|2024-07-22T20:30:01.671Z -- nazmul%20hossain%20nihal -- wpfavicon
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Nazmul Hossain Nihal WPFavicon allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WPFavicon: from n/a through 2.1.1.
